profileAlternative.name: Randy Petkoff
profileAlternative.headline: CAE Manager - Cloud
profileAlternative.summary: Our team is obsessed with delivering technical and business value to the developer community. We know time is a precious resource so we're focused on enabling teams to concentrate on meaningful work. We're here to help you build apps faster using MongoDB Atlas, Stitch, Mongo Mobile, and seeing it all in real-time natively through Mongo Charts.

given.text: Chad has a deep understanding of Network Security and recognizes the fundamentals’ necessary to create a secure business infrastructure. His attention to detail and relevant personal experience make him an asset to companies needing assistance with security and endpoint management.
